# Algimantas K. - Portfolio & Public Projects

Personal portfolio and collection of open-source projects focused on AI, knowledge systems, documentation, and creative works.

## Featured Projects

### ðŸ§  Knowledge & Memory Systems

**RKnowledge** - Knowledge Graph Extraction & Analysis
- Production-grade CLI for extracting concepts and relationships from documents
- Neo4j integration with interactive visualization
- https://algiras.github.io/RKnowledge/
- https://github.com/Algiras/RKnowledge

**Memory Palace + Red Queen** - Durable Knowledge System
- Ancient method of loci combined with adversarial testing
- Claude Code skill for interview prep and learning
- https://algiras.github.io/memory-palace/
- https://github.com/Algiras/memory-palace

### ðŸ¤– AI Tools & Agents

**Skillz** - Self-Extending MCP Server
- MCP-compliant server for runtime tool creation and execution
- Let your AI create its own capabilities
- https://algiras.github.io/skillz/
- https://github.com/Algiras/skillz

**EmbedEval** - LLM Output Evaluation Framework
- Binary pass/fail evaluation with error analysis
- Trace-centric, evaluation-first approach
- https://algiras.github.io/embedeval/
- https://github.com/Algiras/embedeval

### ðŸ“š Documentation & Quality

**Clean Docs** - Documentation Quality Validator
- CLI tool for code snippet validation and broken link detection
- CI/CD integration (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
- https://algiras.github.io/clean-docs/
- https://github.com/Algiras/clean-docs

### ðŸ“– Creative & Educational Works

**Complex Parenting** - A Guide for the Double Diagnosis
- Comprehensive guide for parents raising teens with Bipolar Disorder and Autism/ADHD
- Clinical research meets lived experience
- https://algiras.github.io/complex-parenting/
- https://github.com/Algiras/complex-parenting

**GeleÅ¾inio Vilko Saga** - Epic Dark Fantasy
- Multi-book series set in 14th-century Lithuania
- Available in multiple formats (online, PDF, EPUB, audiobook)
- https://algiras.github.io/wolf-saga/
- https://github.com/Algiras/wolf-saga

## Technologies & Expertise

- **Languages:** Rust, Python, TypeScript, Scala, Java
- **AI/ML:** Claude API, LLM evaluation, knowledge graphs, RAG systems
- **Tools:** MCP (Model Context Protocol), Neo4j, tree-sitter, Bazel
- **Practices:** Documentation quality, code validation, evaluation frameworks
